name: One Too Many
description:
Controls: WASD or arrowkeys to move; "K" to kill your followers.

Story aspect of theme:

Most people think that having only 1 of something is a limitation. However, it doesn't have to be that way. In this platformer, you will be placed into a scenario where you have to decide whether you want to persevere through tough challenges with your increasing size and powers, or kill all of your subordinates to pass through challenges alone.  There are advantageous and drawbacks associated with both styles of play. This platformer is played with WASD or arrowkeys and "K" for killing your subordinates. Join "One" in his quest to be the largest number in the world, or join him to see the abomination of too big a number, and realized the benefits of being "Only One".

For those that want a mechanical implementation of the theme:

- 1 coin

- 1 level

- 1 player

- 1 skill

- 1 digit numbers

- The number 1!!!
